title: VinSlied
author: VinSlied
content: Hello,This is an review on bets.io.Sadly this online casino has a beautiful layout. But the rewarding system makes you unable to play the higher you come. In their loyalty system.Do other people have also this experience?

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: You're in the wrong board mate. This thread should belong to gambling section.Quote from: VinSlied on February 12, 2023, 11:02:38 AMThis is an review on bets.io.Who asked you to give a review on "bets.io" right in your first post? You would be better off posting it in their ANN thread instead of making a separate topic. However, bets team seems to be inactive in the forum, not sure if you should still gamble on this site.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Yes as highlighted by @Edwardard this is completely off topic here. @VinSlied I think your feedback could be useful for both players and casino owners but you need to elaborate and explain clearly why you think "the rewarding system makes you unable to play the higher you come"...Personally I never played here so I have not idea of what you're referring ....

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: VinSlied on February 12, 2023, 11:02:38 AMDo other people have also this experience?Whatever your problem is with the services of the Bets.io gambling site, it is wise if you check the service carefully and in detail before you try to do anything there.Be careful using betting services Bets.io, they have different teams and threads here.Proof:1. Topic: BETS.IO Casino Up to 20% Cashback Every Day | 10-Minute Cashout | No KYC2. Alpha AffiliatesLast Active:¬†¬†¬†December 27, 2022, 03:00:42 PM2. betsiocasinoLast Active:¬†¬†¬†October 24, 2021, 09:59:39 PMTry to find gambling site services that are responsible and reputable in the future, at least if there is a problem someone will handle it, whether it's about prizes, withdrawals, games and so on.

comments.author: incognicko777
comments.body: bets.io is pretty great in my opinion. They‚Äôve got super quick deposits and withdrawals. An impressive amount of providers with some great slots and table games. But what I like is the bonuses and promos, and they‚Äôre support staff couldn‚Äôt be more helpful or responsive. Phil and Barney really know their stuff and are very prompt with solving issues. Overall I would (and have lol) recommended this casino to many friends. There is no KYC or verification on deposits or withdrawals because it‚Äôs all crypto. Give them a try üíÅüèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

comments.author: QueenVera
comments.body: Quote from: incognicko777 on April 24, 2023, 03:22:21 AMbets.io is pretty great in my opinion. They‚Äôve got super quick deposits and withdrawals. An impressive amount of providers with some great slots and table games. But what I like is the bonuses and promos, and they‚Äôre support staff couldn‚Äôt be more helpful or responsive. Phil and Barney really know their stuff and are very prompt with solving issues. Overall I would (and have lol) recommended this casino to many friends. There is no KYC or verification on deposits or withdrawals because it‚Äôs all crypto. Give them a try üíÅüèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èThere is actually something very fishy about all of this because I see no reason why a newbie account just springs up from absolutely no where with claims against a casino that has long been absent here a d another newbie account also coming out from the blues with clams to defend same casinoWell I'm not pointing fingers at anyone but from closer look, you'll also see that the first account with claims against the casino made hut a single post and same thing with the defending account as well.Whatever the case might be, rather than all this dramas, I think the casino should simply just reactivate their thread and get things straight.
